column4: and when I do sudo umount /media/Free... it just tries and tries and doesn't stop (on terminal)
I don't get an error message, or nothing
what's FS? there's no files in them

when the system things the removeable drive is still mounted while it is unplugged, next time you plug that removeable device again (while the system is still under that confusion), you will have another folder that differs from the first by a number and sometimes with an underscore at the end
yeah, I don't see the "ask for password" or "go on standby" or any of that, it's not there
I thought you want to disable sleeping altogether
under On Ac Power there is a "Display" section
Remember this has implication on your battery life
I mean if your laptop does not sleep and is always 100% bright (esp On Battery)
I dont think  its a problem for On AC Power mode
